headline: Pinterest Adds Retail Expertise As Shares Trade Below Valuation Estimates
summary: Pinterest (NYSE:PINS) has appointed retail executive Kecia Steelman to its board of directors. Steelman brings experience from senior roles at Ulta Beauty, Family Dollar Stores, and Home Depot. The appointment adds consumer and store-level retail expertise as Pinterest continues to build out its commerce and advertising efforts. For investors tracking NYSE:PINS, this board change comes at a time when the share price is around $20.33, with the stock showing a 48.6% decline over the past year...
